reviews.review_text: Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied intake assessment with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 113% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 5 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the session structure from Module 1. Now charging $244 per session vs $50 before. Game changer.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 12 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
